description: The multi-platinum career of the famed small town boy from Indiana hits home with the 1st ever retrospective from John Mellencamp. The Best That I Can Do features 16 songs that have changed the face of pop music; from his 1st hit "I Need a Lover" to the landmark "Pink Houses," then "Cherry Bomb"; from the anthemic "R.O.C.K. in the USA" and "Jack And Diane" to the recent #1 hit "Wild Night" and more. The collection is highlighted by a new song, "Without Expression," serviced to rock, Top 40, AC and AAA radio.
